title: Fishermen
creator_credit: Guy L. Cote and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Should he choose to stay boss of his own boat and hope for better catches, or seek a job in commercial fishing, trading independence for a more certain income? This film is about the choice that faces many of Canada’s east-coast fishermen. (Awards: Berlin; Bloemfontein; Columbus)
creator_credit_for_label: Guy L. Cote and National Film Board of Canada
